issue.title: [C++] Skip delimiter checking in CSV chunker if quoting is false
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14150](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14150). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Delimiter checking is not necessary for csv chunker if quoting is disabled. Bypassing the delimiter checking improves performance significantly.
